snippet.title: Cops N' Zombies Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Cops N' Zombies is an intense multiplayer horror social-oriented/deduction game. You and your team are to investigate a desolate map while one of your teammates is secretly a Zombie. The zombie player can transform at will and must use this to their advantage to kill all the police. The police can also find weapons and kill who they think are the zombie. How will you figure out who's who and who to trust?

Release Date: TBA/Spring 2024
Update coming!
Wishlist the game now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2066000/Cops_N_Zombies/

Join the Discord to stay up to date!
https://discord.gg/dvaSMv3ftW
